sn1.39:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
sn1.39:1.3: Atha kho kokanada pajjunnassa dhita abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam mahavanam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi.
sn1.39:1.4: Ekamantam thita kho sa devata kokanada pajjunnassa dhita bhagavato santike ima gathayo abhasi:
